item.title: postgreSQL
item.description: PostgreSQL Downloading on Debian #!/bin/bash -e sudo sh -c 'echo "deb http://apt.postgresql.org/pub/repos/apt $(lsb_release -cs)-pgdg main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/pgdg.list' wget --quiet -O - https://www.postgresql.org/media/keys/ACCC4CF8.asc | sudo apt-key add - sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get -y install postgresql sudo apt-get -y install postgresql-12 Service Restart ( use it to start the server ) sudo service postgresql restart Connecting to DB as the above setup creates a user process named postgresql sudo -i -u postgres psql Creating User
